properties.name: embedUrl
properties.label: Embed URL
properties.description: Paste the Looker Studio Embed URL (use Embed > Embed URL in Looker Studio). Example: https://lookerstudio.google.com/embed/reporting/REPORT_ID/page/PAGE_ID

properties.name: secureEmbed
properties.label: Secure Embed (private report)
properties.description: If the report is private, set this to true and implement server-side authentication or use users' Google accounts to view the report.
